The act of your friend has caused a violation for both the hotel and yourself. In this case your friend violated and disrespected your own privacy by going beyond relational measures to try to forcible enter into your private quarters through deceiving means. Your friend would be considered a trespasser to the hotel.  Actions have been taken to ensure that such a situation never occurs at our hotel again.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: I loved this place! I always try to find the smaller places when visiting the beach and i was not disappointed. Both my mother and I stayed I had a smaller room she had the bigger family room. They both had a fridge and coffee maker which was great ac was good. Location couldnt be better walk to the beach. Lots of places to eat nearby. I recommend the doughnut place across the way and the corndog place down the street. Loved the stay will recommend and hopefully be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Brittany, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel during your stay. We strive to provide our guests with the best experience available. I would agree in that our location is prime and certainly makes us one of the hot spots for the summer. Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit with us.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: we will not be back the room was small dirty and super noisy. there is a bar about 200 feet away and there was drunk people yelling and partying all night. the parking lot was tiny, our f30 would only fit in one spot so we had to hope it was available every time we had to park.
Manager Response: Dear Jefe0le, We are sorry to hear that your stay at our hotel was uneasy due to the noise that was caused by another business. We hope that you will consider staying with us again and find your next stay with us enjoyable. Best Regards, Management

Summary: We stayed in the "Laguna Beach" room which looked very nice. The bathroom looked like it bad been redone in the last 5 years with nice tile and a jacuzzi open to the sleeping quarters. The service we received was polite and the complementary bicycle rental was great for a morning ride along the beach. It is about two blocks from the beach and it only took us 20 minutes to ride to Balboa Pier. Finding the hotel was difficult driving in on the one-way streets at night and the parking lot is pretty small. Inside we also noticed ants both on the bed and in the bathroom. We didn't use the TV but did notice that the mount was loose causing the TV to hang crooked. Overall we enjoyed our overnight stay a short ways off the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony Ciccarello , Thank you for taking the time to write your feedback. We are proud to offer our guests complimentary amenities such as the bikes, and we are pleased that you were able to enjoy them. We try our best to give our guests an experience they will remember. I am glad you had an enjoyable experience during your stay with us and look forward to your next visit. Regards, Management

Summary: I stayed in a nice small room on the second floor (room #2).  The room has an ocean view and it's a very short walk to the beach/ Newport pier.  There's a very small working space and the WiFi works well.    There are lots of restaurants/bars within walking distance of the Inn.  The Doughnut shop across the street was a great bonus.    I didn't interact much with the staff.  Both my check in/out the employees were very courteous.   When I'm in the area again, I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Rob R, We are glad that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and were able to enjoy the little view room number 2 had to offer. We look forward to your next stay with us. Sincerely, Gita

Summary Heading: Central location. Budget hotel. Just fine for what it is.
Summary: I needed a clean bed and bath, with desk and wifi in central Newport Beach and this was just fine.  Certainly a dated motel-style building with the usual tiny lobby, things were clean enough.  My room was surprisingly large and the location was a bonus.  While not on the beach, it was a couple blocks from it, with easy access to everything in the downtown area. Wifi and parking were of course free and they let me check in around 11:00 at night, stay until 12:30 the next afternoon and leave my car in the parking lot until mid afternoon.  All good.
Manager Response: Dear David P, Thank you for taking the time to leave this well-thought out review of our hotel. We are glad to hear you had an excellent experience and we were able to meet all your needs during your stay. Thank you again for your wonderful feedback  and we hope you will stay with us again in the future!  Gita

Summary Heading: Cute, Convenient Place with the Essentials
Summary: We had a great stay.  The King Beach room was well-equipped and big *enough*, though it's much smaller than it looks in the pictures.  The balcony doesn't exactly have an ocean view, but rather of a donut shop and Subway. That said, it was comfortable, clean, and has a SUPER convenient location.  The complementary bikes are a bit rusty, but really came in handy for going to dinner and checking out The Wedge. It's two small blocks from nice sandy beach, and only twice that far to the Newport pier and shops/bars there.
Manager Response: Dear Geoffarson, We are thrilled to hear how much you've enjoyed our Little Inn during your stay. Glad to hear you stayed in one of our best seller rooms, Balboa Balcony Guest Room, that includes a small balcony in addition to the King bed. Furthermore we are happy to know that you enjoyed just about all of the great qualities our small hotel has to offer. We look forward to any future stays you may have with us and thank you again for your feedback! Gita

Summary: Here again!  Had to ask for light bulbs for the lights, electric outlets next to bed don't work, the kids and the bar, liquor store are VERY LOUD at about 1 o'clock in the morning, the walls are paper thin (we could hear neighbors entire conversation), the ironing board was broken, no hooks for towels to dry in the bathroom, the beach chairs they provide appear to be 15 years old, when the neighbor takes a shower, it sounds like a freight train coming thru the room.....this place tries to look fancy but it's really cheesy.
Manager Response: Hello Slw365, We regret to hear that you had a less than enjoyable experience at our hotel during your stay. As we know light bulbs can burn out in unexpected times, if it does happen during any guest's stay we are more than happy to replace it for you, as in this case. The noise from pedestrians is unfortunately out of our control at this time but we do our best to keep noise level low on our part. We do not pretend to be a resort, but do offer up to date rooms and the perfect location in the heart of the Newport Beach Peninsula that many of our guests love.    Gita

Summary Heading: Great Find, Great Rates, Great Service!
Summary: Just home from our trip last night! We had a great(but all too short!) stay at the Little Inn! Very nice room(#4) with a comfy bed, good shower. Excellent location and the free bikes were just the icing on the cake! We rode up and down the beach for miles and saw sites we never would have without having them. All the staff were just great, friendly and accommodating..Overall, just a great stay!  Thanks! Mike and Linda Burlington, Ontario, Canada
Manager Response: Hello Mike, We are glad to hear that you had such a wonderful time at our small hotel. We thank you for staying with us and providing us with your feedback.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: A Jack hammer hammering a hole through my soul
Summary: Overall, an okay hotel however I booked online (through their website, not an external site), and no where did it say that they were undergoing renovations.  They had renovations the whole week from 7am to 5pm and there was a jack hammer both days I was there that was so loud even if I was in my room.  Also, said jack hammer started at 7am!!!  So early for someone on vacation.  They did not tell me this when I booked and therefore had no way out.  Additionally, they take a $100 security deposit which is absurd consider that was more than the cost of the room.  And I didn't know this until I got there.  Looking back it is on there website but i  very samll print at the bottom of the home page.  The room was fin, but very small and the air conditioner was broken along with a sheet
Manager Response: Hello Christina P,  We apologize for the inconvenience our past renovations had on your stay. We hope that you will allow us another opportunity and that you find the comfortable stay we expect all of our guests to have. In regards to the security deposit, is a standard policy that our hotel (along with numerous other) have. It is more uncommon for a deposit to be withheld at our hotel. As you saw for your stay the deposit is usually always returned. We look forward to any future business we may have with you. Little Inn

Summary Heading: Disgusting soiled body fluid stains and blood on the bedding
Summary: Warning in Advance, Do Not stay at this Hotel!!! Disgusting bedding soiled with body fluids and blood, there was no way we could stay in the room after this experience. The room overall was not clean, what was next Bed bugs!!! So when we checked into this,"little Inn By The Bay Newport Beach Hotel", 2627 Newport Blvd. We then proceeded to our Room #9. I wanted to sit on the edge of the bed and had noticed that the silky top sheet cover had a yellow, brown tinge to it.  I removed it and the comforter/blanket that was underneath it was extremely soiled with bright yellow stains, upon further inspection, I found drops of dried blood, lipstick, just nasty body fluid stains. The front desk lady was checking rooms right at that same time, she wanted to know how the room was for us, so
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I got booked that hotel I was reading really bad reviews and I was a bit discouraged but hey, that's what the company paid. Anyway, reviews are mostly wrong.  The place is a bijoux, a real pearl near the beach. Room was clean, refurnished and so comfortable! Of course, they say it.. it's like a small boutique in fact rooms are quite small but comfortable that's for sure. People were complaining about the liquor store but the room is totally isolated from the outside noises so unless you open the door you won't listen absolutely no noise.  I have something to say about the management, they did a mistake with my reservation and basically on Saturday morning they wanted to kick me out.. "DOH!" - The company had to send someone physically to bring the credit card, double "DOH!"
Manager Response: Dear GP E, Thank you for your feedback and do our best to improve on our service. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and were able to enjoy some of the many perks our prime location has to offer. We do apologize for the small mishap that occurred from your reservation and we're happy to have resolved it. We hope you allow us to be of service to you again in the future and that we will be able to again leave you with a memorable experience.  Gita

Summary: The property itself is nice. Great location close to the pier and restaurants. Check in was friendly and efficient. We had a balcony room with a nice patio. The room was clean and updated. Overall the experience was great as it was nice to sit on the patio and people watch. The problem is that unless you are one of the drunks leaving the bar at 2:00 am, forget about sleeping. We were here on a Saturday night and it was crazy how loud people were once the bars closed down. It was like a parade of loud, screaming people for at least 45 minutes. It's not the inns fault and they would otherwise get 5 stars. Just be forewarned about the noise.
Manager Response: Dear Samndjsdad, First and foremost we would like to thank you for your honest review of our hotel. We are glad that you were able to enjoy one of our most sought after rooms the , Balboa Balcony Guestroom. We do apologize for the inconvenience you encountered during your stay with us. It is true that this is a popular area during the weekends and we hope to combat this noise issue for future visits.

Summary: Great place to stay! If you come to Newport....this location is the best. You have everything you need within walking distance. ...and The Wedge is a shirt bike ride away!!!!!! I obviously love to surf but it's still a must see while in Orange County. ....
Manager Response: Jason G,  It is so wonderful to hear such positive feedback from you. Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience and recommending our hotel to others. Not only are we a short walking distance to restaurants, bars, and the beach, but we offer beach equipment, such as bikes so that guests like yourself can ride down to the Wedge. We hope to see you again soon!   Best, Gita

Summary: I had the stomachs flu over 24 hours before my reservation. I called to ask if I can cancel and the manager said she will charge me anyway because too many people are making that excuse lately. Luckily I felt better the next day and made it to the hotel. The lady at reservation desk wouldn't let me get my key until 3:00 because it's policy...I was 20 minutes early. The bikes are a joke. Broken and rusty with flat tires. The beach towels they give you are white bath towels that they document so they dont get stolen..I felt more like a prisoner than a guest. The staff would be great correction officers..not good for customer service at all!
Manager Response: Tana H, I am sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as pleasant as it should have been. Our hotel policy does state that we have a 72 hour cancellation policy, if cancelled or if we have a no show, our policy states that we must charge the first night. Unfortunately, our entire staff must abide by our policy, which was why we couldn’t cancel your reservation a day before your arrival. In regards to your check-in process, we apologize but unless the room is ready, we cannot provide guests with keys, we are always happy to accommodate our guests when it comes to early check in’s, but they are solely based upon availability. We apologize for the bike situation you underwent, many of our guests stay with us for our location and the amenities we offer such as the complimentary bikes, beach towels, umbrellas, and chairs and the broken bikes were a result of a particularly busy summer we underwent and guests who enjoyed the bikes to the fullest. We have acquired new bikes and because we offer such complimentary beach equipment must keep track of all items, in order to ensure we can provide for all our guests. Again we apologize that you did not enjoy your stay as much as we would have hoped, but thank you for you feedback.  Best Regards,  Gita

Summary: Great location in Newport Beach, walking distance to the beach and Pier. So many great restaurants nearby. They also offer free bikes, can't beat that. Rooms are not 5 star but for this location and in this price range, just fine. Would stay again :)
Manager Response: oshowCanada, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your positive feedback, we are truly delighted that you chose to stay with us. Our location like you mentioned is truly superb, minutes away from the best restaurants in town and the beach, and take a bike ride while you’re at it. We are glad to hear you had a wonderful stay and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards,  Gita

Summary Heading: Very nice little place for a great price!
Summary: As we usually go to Laguna Beach we did not this time as it is Sawdust Festival & overly crowded and hotel prices are more than I'm willing to pay so searched on-line and came across this little gem.  It is not right on the beach but about 1/2 -1 block away.  Very easy to get to.  Had a very nice, clean king room with A/C, fridge, coffee pot, ironing board, hairdryer; etc.  They offered free bicycles to ride the bike path on the beach which my hubby took advantage of.  We arrived on 8/11/15 (Taco Tuesday) & the gal at the desk suggested we try "Slapfish" right across the street & since we were tired driving down from LV in horrible traffic we did and it was just what the Dr. ordered!  Tacos were so good my hubby went back for more!  If you wish to imbibe Little Inn is right next
Manager Response: Hello pepi4health, we would like to thank you for taking the time to say such wonderful things about our hotels. Although we are not directly in front of the beach, you are right, we are just a few minutes away. All of our rooms have been recently renovated to provide our guests the best quality we can offer and I am glad to hear you confirm that. It’s just like everyone says, do not judge a book by its cover, we may not look like a grand hotel on the outside but on the inside we provide nothing with the best, including the free beach equipment and beach cruisers we are glad you took advantage of. I am also delighted, but not surprised that our service lead you to one of the many delicious restaurants nearby us. We are genuinely happy to hear that you had such a wonderful time at our small hotel. Again thank you for all of your positive feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards,  Gita

Summary: The receptionist received us with a very welcoming smile and quiet helpful with local restaurants and sites.  The location is fabulous as you are just steps away from the ocean, shopping and bars.  However, the street noise from loud car stereos and pedestrians is awful.  So if you are a light sleeper this would not be the place for you.  The price point is reasonable and the Wi-Fi is perfect.
Manager Response: Angelidecovoio, first things first, we would just like to thank you for the wonderful feedback you have provided. Nothing makes us happier and more proud of our staff here at Little Inn By the Bay than getting a positive review about a guest’s stay. We are always happy to help guests, no matter what the inquiry is, best restaurants? Best bars? Best shopping centers? Just like you said, they are all within walking distance, or even a bike ride, if you’d like to use one of our complimentary beach cruisers. Of course, being located in the heart of the Newport Beach Peninsula, the noise from traffic or pedestrians are unfortunately out of our hands. But it is nothing our location and many other amenities can’t make up for. We hope you stay with us again soon and thank you again for your feedback!  Best,  Gita

Summary: I found this little Inn on short notice due to a Memorial in Newport Beach I had to go to.  The hotel was close to where I needed to be plus it was across the street from my most favorite Mexican restaurant of all time, Avila's Mi Ranchito.  The hotel is located in between two major streets and you couldn't really get more in the middle of things literally.  Close to everything by walking or bikes (which they provide).  The rooms were remodeled fairly nicely but the carpets were filthy and the bathroom was small and narrow.  I'm a big guy, so navigating the bathroom was a tiny challenge.  But none the less it was adequate.  I would have given a higher rating just for the service alone.  They will go out of their way to accommodate most of your requests.  I really liked the
Manager Response: Kevin R., I am sorry for the reasons behind your stay with us, however, we are absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. You are correct, Avila’s El Ranchito, is a fantastic Mexican restaurant, and is among many more great restaurants within walking distance from our prime location, which is also just minutes from the beach. We are more than happy to know you enjoyed just about all of the great qualities our small hotel has to offer, especially our customer service. Thank you again for your wonderful feedback, we will always be happy to help, and hope you will stay with us again in the future!   Best Regards,  Gita

Summary: Spent a long weekend at The Little  Inn by the Bay and happy we chose this hotel. Clean, cute room, nice and helpful front desk staff. The bikes were a plus in getting around town. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Jan,  It is so wonderful to hear that you had such a positive experience here at our small hotel! Also that you were able to take advantage of the bikes, we also offer complimentary beach towels, umbrellas and beach chairs, just what you need for a trip to the beach. In addition, I'm glad you mentioned just how helpful our staff can be, we are a small team but work hard to provide all of our guests the best service. Thank you for taking the time and providing your feedback. See you soon!   Best Regards,   Gita

Summary: The stair carpet was worn but the room was immaculate. We had the Balboa room with a balcony. The two rooms with balconies overlook the street  but are still worth it for the fresh air, sun and extra room. The hotel itself is "quaint" but our room was just as good as many Marriotts or Hiltons we have stayed in, possibly better. You cannot beat the price/ location factor here. We stayed here for my wife's birthday combining it with a dinner three blocks away at the Dock.  Great for walking around the town and the beach.
Manager Response: Dear braidmacd,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. Honestly, I feel like there is nothing better than receiving it, as it gives us to the opportunity to become better in every aspect.  I am glad you were able to stay in one of our prime rooms. Balboa, although. it does not have the full sized Jacuzzi big enough for two people, does have jets in its standard shower/tub setup, perfect for a relaxation. Thank you for complimenting our hotel in comparison to a Marriott or Hilton. We don't pretend to be a resort, but do offer up to date rooms and complimentary beach equipment to make your stay and trip down by the beach as enjoyable as can be. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will join us again soon!  Best,  Gita

Summary: This place has so much potential, but sadly, it falls very far short of expectations. Husband and I stayed here over Memorial Day weekend for our anniversary. We were looking for someplace quaint but centrally located to restaurants and activities. Little Inn definitely fits the bill in that respect.   The property is located smack dab in the middle of all things Newport Beach - the corner of Newport Blvd. & Balboa Blvd - so getting in & out was a pain. We opted to walk to dinner, which was nice. The parking lot itself is small, as are the spaces, which was quite irritating. We have a truck - so you can imagine the creativity involved with parking.  The hotel itself is a dump. Yeah, I said it. First, they are understaffed. We arrived to find a completely empty reception area,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst Customer Service EVER - DO NOT STAY HERE
Summary: My best friend and I took my two sons (ages 8 and 6) down to Newport Beach for this last weekend for a quick weekend getaway to meet up with other friends. We originally had a reservation at the Fairmont hotel but found this hotel that had good ratings and decent prices (although $40/night more than Fairmont) and closer to the beach so we canceled Fairmont and I took the cost hit thinking it would be a better choice location-wise... boy was I wrong! We arrived late (almost 10:00 p.m.), but were pleased with the cleanliness and updated room (although extremely small) room. My friend used the restroom and it immediately clogged. We called the front desk and they said they would bring a plunger for US to fix it even though it was clogged BEFORE we got there. So my friend tried and
Manager Response: Hello Nichelle, I am very sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as memorable as you or we would have wanted it to be, please accept our most sincere apologies. I appreciate your feedback as it always helps our service improve. I would like to clarify one misconception however, housekeeping always reports to the front desk if there is something wrong with the room and mentioned how the toilet was functioning just fine as they cleaned it. Our plumber did mention that something must've been dropped in the toilet and flushed down. I understand it is incredibly hard to keep track of two small little ones, and apologize that the plumber could not get there sooner, but sometimes it is out of our control. Again I apologize for the inconvenience you underwent and thank you for your feedback.  Regards,  Gita

Summary: This very small Inn is so perfectly located, you don't have to drive anywhere once you have parked your car in their lot.  You can conveniently walk to the beach across the street, several restaurants, and shopping.  The hotel also provides bikes to ride along the boardwalk at no additional charge. If you need a beach chair, they'll provide those too.  Free wi-fi, parking,large refrigerator, microwave,  and cable TV.  This place is a tiny gem right in the heart of Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Shirley91011,  I am beyond pleased to hear that you had such an enjoyable experience at our hotel and were able to take advantage of all the amenities our little Inn has to offer. You are correct, one of the best perks of our hotel is location and complimentary parking, of course we do have to limit it to one car per room just to be fair and ensure every room has a spot. But once parked and checked in, you can walk just about anywhere in just a matter of minutes. Thank you for providing such a wonderful feedback. We look forward to having you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Gita

Summary: I was skeptical about this place from some of the other reviews. My husband and I had lived in Newps for about five years, but moved up to the Bay Area a few years ago. We were going back for a quick little visit and decided to go with this place because of the location and the complimentary bikes.  First, our room was recently renovated and completely clean! Score. There was a mini-fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Double score. The ice machine was just downstairs, so convenient but I didn't have to hear the noise. There was a fair amount of noise at night from Cassidy's, but we knew about it going in. The bikes are a mess. Luckily an old friend let us borrow some tools to adjust the seat and tighten things up.  The only suggestion I would have for the establishment is to add
Manager Response: Dear Christine,  First off let me thank you for taking the time and leaving us with your feedback, as I always say there is always room for improvement no matter how well we are already doing. I am glad you pointed out the renovation. We are very happy and proud to provide our guests with such up to date rooms and always have maintenance and our housekeeping team check to make sure all room amenities are in tip top shape. Of course, being right in the heart of Newport Beach, the night life cannot be avoided at times and the situation is left out of our hands. We not pretend to be a resort, we are what we are and offer the best in regards to location and service. Trust that we will take your advisement for room 18. We look forward to seeing you again soon and this time, staying in our Newport or Balboa Balcony Guest Rooms would suit you even better, believe me, you will love it. Take care!  Best,  Gita

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights in March and it is right in the heart of Newport Beach.  The service was excellent and the room was clean, which is all you can ask for.  Would recommend to friends and family who are visiting Newport Beach.  Great getaway!!
Manager Response: Dear Marissa,  Thank you so much for leaving us such wonderful feedback! There's nothing more than seeing how satisfied we leave our guests with the quality of location, room amenities, and customer service that we offer. I am pleased that you will recommend us and hope we will see you all very soon !  Best,   Gita

Summary: Small property with limited number of rooms. Between busy streets but quiet enough at night. They required a $100 room deposit along with payment which was not mentioned in their posting. Seems to get very busy crazy on the weekends with bars and the beach  very close by. Would stay again for business but no amenities to stay longer. Very good price for the area and room was clean and up to date. Our rom was next to the ice machine so you could hear it so often in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: Dear Karynb2015,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us and others with your feedback. You are correct we are certainly centered right at the heart of Newport Beach and many of our guests stay with us for just that reason alone. Unfortunately for the same reason, the night life can cause very busy street noise, and there is not much we can offer to resolve that issue. But as you said we are literally minutes away from the beach, restaurants and will always ensure to keep our rooms clean and up to date just as you experienced. Again, thank you for providing us with your feedback and hope you will stay with us again in the future !  Best Regards,  Gita

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights. Staff were friendly,coffee maker was not working but it was replaced in minutes.Room was perfectly clean. No breakfast included,not a problem just walked 100 yards down the road to Malarkys pub and had a super breakfast.Borrowed chairs for the beach which was less than 200 yds away,all in all a lovely stay. Will return at some point.
Manager Response: Dear oldcodgers2015, we are pleased to have accommodated you at our Little Inn. Your thoughts and opinions are very important to us as we pride ourselves in achieving customer satisfaction. Your feedback not only helps us improve our service, but it also helps travelers. I'm pleased to hear that you took advantage of our complimentary beach equipment that makes it easier on guests especially if your on a budget. All of our rooms have indeed been updated to give it a modern and relaxing feel. On your next visit to Newport beach we hope you consider booking one of our balcony rooms with the oversized Jacuzzi. Thank you again for taking time out of your day to give us a positive review.   Until next time,  Gita

Summary: We stayed here years ago and the current reviews of how terrible this hotel is makes me wonder how they stay in business. Rooms are small with over-sized furniture which takes away nearly all the floor space, making one person have to climb over the bed to get to the small bathroom. Located between two busy main roads prevented us from getting a full nights sleep. Breakfast is served in the shoe box sized foyer.
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear about your less than satisfactory experience during your stay with us. I just want to clarify a misconception: our hotel does not provide breakfast nor claim to provide breakfast.  As far as the noise problem, we are centrally located and within walking distance to many bars and restaurants in the Newport Beach area. I will admit that on Friday and Saturday nights, traffic could be a bit noisy, however, it is because we are so centrally located that many guests stay with us mostly on that alone.I, however, completely understand that we may not be the right hotel for everyone. Additionally, all of our rooms, even if some are not as spacious, are newly refurbished. I wish there was more that I could do to have made your last stay with us in February more enjoyable. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. Should you give us another chance to be of service to you, we promise to, at least, meet your expectations if not surpass it. We are looking forward to your next visit.   Best,  Gita

Summary: The staff here are all unfriendly. It's  situated between very busy streets. Don't plan on getting any sleep here. They have free bikes to ride but I would feel safer walking as the traffic is awful and the bikes are falling apart!! We have stayed here several times but it never gets any better. The Air conditioner sounded like a jet landing outside our door....that"s when it would work??Supposedly they serve free coffee but I never saw any coffee made when we were there. Nice Donut shop across the main street. Don't waste your money. Go down the street and stay at a cheaper and cleaner place. One last thing....Don't cancel your reservations, you'll get charged for it. What a Dump!!!
Manager Response: spirit19512014, I am sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as pleasant as it should have been. I am not sure what room you stayed in. Just the same, I have instructed my housekeeping as well as engineering staff to check that all a/c units are up to par and to let me know of any problems. These are flaws that can be rectified quite easily. The complimentary coffee served in our lobby for our guests is every morning from 8 am until 1 pm and of course there is also complimentary coffee in all of our rooms as well. As far as the street noise is concerned, there is not much that I can do as our little hotel is located between two very busy streets and surrounded by several eateries and bars. When these places close around 2 am, the streets can get quite loud, especially around weekends. Quite a lot of our guests like us mostly for our proximity to these places. I, however, completely understand that we may not be the right hotel for everyone. I appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback and I wish there was more that we could have done to make your stay more enjoyable.   Regards,  Gita

Summary Heading: Nice for a Day/Night/Morning at the Beach
Summary: The location of this property is perfect. I read reviews (good & bad) about the hotel before I booked and It all came down to price and location. The room was clean and modern. I had all the essentials and the best part was that I was allowed to check in early (no extra charge). This early check in let me grab some coffee at the beach, meet some surfers and explore the area. I had enough time to head back to the hotel to freshen up before heading out to happy hour for good bites, good drinks, and music. I read a review that refer to this hotel as a motel, on the outside it does very much look like one but the quality of my room did not. I only stayed the night and I wanted to be as close to the beach as possible without paying crazy money. When I checked in the front desk
Manager Response: CeeBeretta, I would like to thank you for taking the time to say such wonderful things about our hotel. As you said we are centrally located making it easier to get just about anywhere in minutes. All of our rooms have been recently renovated to provide our guests the best quality we can offer and I am glad to hear you confirm that. It’s just like everyone says, do not judge a book by its cover, we may not look like a grand hotel on the outside but on the inside we provide nothing with the best, including the free beach equipment and beach cruisers we offered you. I’m delighted to hear, but not surprised, that our service was great, I expect nothing less from our staff, who are always happy to help our guests at all times. Thank you again for all nice comments on our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,   Gita

Summary: This hotel was in a convenient location and our room was clean.  Traffic noise could be handled by closing the window, however the air conditioner seemed very loud, perhaps because the room was so small.  The entry door to our room abutted the bathroom door, and thus it was a challenge just to bring in our carry-on luggage. The decor was nice and the bed was comfortable, but the room was much smaller than the online pictures indicated.  The bathroom was pretty with lots of marble, but very tiny; so much so that to make room for a tub the inside rim of the tub had been made too narrow for a grip - only 1/4" at one point, resulting in an interesting challenge to get out after taking a bath, since there was no grab bar to make up for the lack of leverage. There was no safe in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback, I’m glad you chose to stay with us. We have recently remodeled all of our rooms to provide only the best for our guests, it brings me great pleasure to hear that you enjoyed the decor. You are correct about all the amenities we are pleased to offer our guests, including the free wifi, mini fridge, microwave and coffee, but we also have much more! We offer complimentary bikes, beach towels, umbrellas and beach chairs, that I wish you could have also taken advantage of. I apologize for the issues upon check in and check out, normally we only provide emailed statements due our computer system, but I am glad our staff was able to print out a written one for you like you requested. Thank you for noting that we allowed you to check your bags with us, we know that guests aren’t in a hurry to leave beautiful Newport Beach. Again thank you for your feedback and hope to see you soon!  Sincerely,  Gita

Summary: I have to say that after reading all of the reviews I was a little hesitant to stay here.  I have to let everyone know that being someone who used to live on the penninsula this place was very nice.   Reviewers can always find faults in something and most of the reviewers have pointed them out.  Now I have to say that staying here in the middle of summer and staying there just this past weekend are much different.  If you want peace and quite this isnt the place for you.  If you want to be close to the beach, not worry about parking and have a very comforatable bed to sleep in then thumbs up.  Towels, chairs, bikes are all included.  No need to pack them.  I was taken care of and had great conversation with everyone that worked there.  In addition I would like to recognize Gita.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff M,  First things first, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to write your feedback. I am so happy that you chose to stay with us out of all the other hotels here on the peninsula. You are correct about the complimentary amenities such as the bikes, and we are pleased that you were able to enjoy them. We try our best to give our guests an experience they will remember for a long time. I am glad you had such a wonderful experience during your stay and look forward to your next visit.  Regards,  Gita

Summary: This hotel is on a small strip of land between two busy streets - right next to a liquor store and tattoo parlor.  The donut store across the street had a security guard.  It is a terrible, noisy location.  There were spiders in the room.  We asked to cancel our reservation - which had been made that morning - and were refused.  Terrible stay!  Did not sleep well.  Do not make this mistake yourself.  Find a better hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Gayl122,  I apologize that you did not find our hotel as pleasing as we would have liked, we are centrally located and that is what guests love about us. Unfortunately we have a 72 hour cancellation policy for our hotel and stick by it and for that reason is why we were unable to cancel your reservation. Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback as it always helps us improve.  Regards,  Gita

Summary: We booked this hotel for Memorial Day weekend after looking and ALL the different hotels in the area. This was a GREAT location!  Our room was on the 2nd floor and very nice.  The bed was comfortable, and we had a view of the bay.  We arrived at about NOON, and they had a room ready for us, which was great because we had been driving for over 5 hours and just wanted to get settled.  The hotel is in a great location, just a couple of blocks from the beach and all of the restaurants and bars.  The 2nd day we were there, we took advantage of the free bicycles and rode on the beach down to Huntington Beach and spent a couple of hours checking out the bars and shops there, before riding back.  The staff was very friendly, the room was clean and nice, and we would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Dear SarahD13,  Thank you for all the nice comments you have posted about our hotel, nothing is more rewarding than knowing we were able to provide our guests with a memorable experience. You are correct about our being centrally located, with the beach just a short couple blocks away and that is just one out of the great amenities that our hotel offers, we also have complimentary beach chairs, towels, umbrellas and bikes for our guests to use. It sounds to me like you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us, and for that I am beyond happy. Again thank you, my staff and I cannot wait for your next visit.   Sincerely,  Gita

Summary: Thoroughly disappointed with our stay. First, they lost our reservation, then they put us in a room we didn't book. Two different employees offered to comp the first night for the inconvenience, and then charged us full price anyway. There was no management on site to deal with the situation, and my call to the lead supervisor has yet to be answered... She clearly cannot be bothered with the common courtesy of a return phone call. Extremely unprofessional and very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy B.,  Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconvenience that you had to undergo unfortunately there was a bit of miscommunication on both parts in regards to your reservation. However, I would like to thank you for your feedback, it is greatly appreciated as it always helps us improve our service.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: The only thing good about this "hotel" is that it is close to the beach. Facility and rooms were nothing like advertised on the website. Room smell musty and gross upon arrival. Front desk staff was unknowledgable and rude. Housekeeping was rude and lazy. Front desk area was dirty and unclean. Had to remind front desk to make coffee in the lobby. Staff just doesn't care about anything except collecting your harx earned money. I will glady pay twice as much to stay elswhere next time.
Manager Response: Hello 63beachdad, I am very sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as memorable as you or we would have wanted it to be, please accept our most sincere apologies. I appreciate your feedback as it always helps our service improve.  We would like to remind you that we only have a single staff member who not only takes calls, but checks in/out our guests, deals with maintenance issues as we do not have a maintenance employee on site, and any other request a guest might have like asking for beach chairs, and it could be that this was the reason the coffee we offer in the lobby was not ready. However, I can assure you that every single issue you pointed out has been discussed with every staff member in order to ensure that our service is impeccable.  Again thank you for your feedback and reviewing our hotel. Should you allow us to be of service to you again in the future, I promise it will be a completely different and more memorable experience.  Gita

Summary: We were looking for a place to spend a romantic day and night getaway. This place was perfect for what we wanted because of it's location, very close to the beach and the bay. About 2 blocks to the beach and about 1 1/2 blocks to the bay. There are many restaurants plus the pier within walking distance. I read some other reviews that complained of noise but our experience was completely the opposite. The room was very clean and the large tub was fabulous. The price was very reasonable as well. The management was polite and accommodating. Another great thing is they have free parking which is very rare on the peninsula. We are definitely staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kabbub,  I want to personally thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and our management, for me there is nothing more rewarding than to see a guest write how much he/she enjoyed their stay with us. It was my great pleasure to be of service to you and it is true that we are centrally located, the beach, bars, and restaurants are all within walking distance. I can't help but to brag about our location because it is such a great convenience to everyone. I am more than pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We here at Little Inn by the Bay look forward to you staying with us again in the future.   Sincerely,    Gita

Summary: I was looking for a nice place within walking distance of the beach, and this place was perfect. My biggest pet peeve with Newport Beach is the lack of parking, so this place was a godsend. I really did not spend too much time in the room, but it was clean and pretty quiet at night with the AC running. The manager downstairs seemed friendly enough and it took me all of five minutes to walk down the beach. Yes, it's a motel. But you simply can't beat the location. Definitely staying here again if I'm ever in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to seeing you again! Please share your experience at Little Inn by the Bay in Newport Beach with friends and family!

Summary: The best thing about this place is the location. It's a very small property with limited parking spaces. You can walk to the beach, pier and the bay.  There are many places to eat. The beach is just a block or so away on one side and the bay is on the other side.  There is a movie theater in walking distance too. The Inn itself is more like a renovated motel.  It is not a quiet or quaint Bed and Breakfast Inn. I used earplugs so the street noise didn't bother me. To be fair and in my experience, anyplace I've stayed on the peninsula has been noisy...especially in the summer. Our room was on the beach-side. There was a nice balcony with so-so patio furniture. The room had been renovated and was more than sufficient and clean.  The bed was comfortable.  They have coffee in the
Manager Response: Dear cmfjaeger,  Thank you for taking the time to write your feedback. We try our best to give our guests an experience that they will remember for a long time. We are located right smack in the middle of Newport Beach night life. Many guests stay with us mostly on that alone. We are 2 blocks from the beach and we renovated our rooms as of 2 years ago. We don't aspire to give the Ritz Carltons or the Sheratons and the Hiltons a run for their money. We are what we are and we take pride in that. I am glad that you had a positive experience during your stay and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Gita

Summary Heading: Don't be fooled--- this is a motel!
Summary: I was fooled by false reviews on Google and photos of renovated room interiors. Beware--- updated furnishings does not equal high quality accommodations or service! This is simply a motel, not a quaint little inn as its name proclaims. Thin walls. Partial hole in the door. Flimsy mattress. Wall-mounted shampoo and body soap dispensers in the shower. While just a few blocks away from the beach, the motel is right next to a liquor store and on a major road, with all its accompanying sounds of traffic. Bring a noise-canceling/white noise machine with you, lest you are fine with a restless night of sleep.    This motel might meet the needs of college kids, but for those who are seeking quality and comfort, I would recommend checking out VRBO or Air B-nB for a beach rental.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as pleasant as it should have been. I am not sure what room you stayed in. Just the same, I have instructed my housekeeping as well as engineering staff to check that all mattresses and a/c units are up to par and to let me know of any problems. These are flaws that can be rectified quite easily. As far as the street noise is concerned, there is not much that I can do as hotel manager. Our little hotel is located between two very busy streets and surrounded by several eateries and bars. When these places close around 2 am, the streets can get quite loud, especially around weekends. Quite a lot of our guests like us mostly for our proximity to these places.  I, however,  completely understand that we may not be the right hotel for everyone. I wish there was more that I could do to have made your stay more enjoyable. Happy New Year.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: We were at the Little Inn by the bay for our 33rd wedding anniversary. This was our first visit to the hotel. The location was perfect for us. We were able to walk to all the places we wanted to go to. The room was clean and comfortable and the amenities were appreciated. The only (minimal) complaint was that the HBO channel did not come in clearly. Little Inn by the bay will definitely be on our list for a return visit!
Manager Response: Dear Grannymle,  I want to personally thank you for the nice comment you have posted about our hotel. I am so happy that you have chosen to spend your 33rd wedding anniversary with us, considering that you have a smorgasbord to choose from. You are correct about our being centrally located and being within walking distance to many restaurants and bars, not to mention the beach, which is a short couple of blocks away. I might as well mention here that our hotel was fully renovated 2 years ago and we continue to receive compliments about the way our rooms are. My night staff did mention the TV reception interference that you reported. I have directed our engineer to look into the problem. Hopefully, it will be an easy fix. Please accept my apology for that.  Lastly, I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary: My husband and I recently spent a get away weekend at the hotel and had a fantastic time. The rooms have recently been updated and are modern, clean and very comfortable. We had our own balcony to relax on after walking most of the day on the beach. The location is perfect; close to many great restaurants and the beach is only a couple of blocks away. The staff are professional and very helpful.  A good value for a beach hotel.
Manager Response: Dear lovetotravelAltaLoma,  Thank you for your nice comments about our hotel and staff. Our hotel was renovated just last year, a fact still reflected in the quality of our rooms. I cannot help but brag a little about our location. We are centrally located, all bars and restaurants in the Newport Beach area are within walking distance. The beach is a short couple of blocks away. It sounds to me like you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us, and for that I am beyond happy.There is nothing more rewarding to me as a hotelier than to see a guest take the time to write how much he/she enjoyed their stay with us. My staff and I cannot wait for your next visit. Thanks, again, from the bottom of our hearts.   Sincerely,  Gita

Summary: Stayed here with my 3 very young grandchildren and their parents. Had a great time. Rooms are clean and appear to be updated. I rented two rooms and the staff made sure our rooms were close together. Staff was very polite and helpful. Hotel is block and a half from the beach...that was the joy. This is a wonderful beach location. Hotel provides beach toys for the kids. Chairs to take to the beach. Bikes to ride. No extra charge. This is a very affordable hotel. Walked to the Cannery for dinner so excellent dining within walking distance. Hotel is on a busy street....if you want quiet and seclusion don't stay here. Having said that it was not THAT noisy. I could say more but will stop now. I will definitely stay at this hotel when traveling to this area again. Thank you to the
Manager Response: Dear gmkline,  First of all, I am very happy to hear that our empowered staff  went out of their way to accommodate your family's needs and that they treated you well. It is nice to know all that training was put to good use. Secondly, I appreciate the wonderful comments that you wrote about our hotel. We are centrally located, we have complimentary amenities such as beach cruisers, beach chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards for our guests to enjoy. I hope that your grandchildren enjoyed the beach toys as well. The beach is a stone's throw away from our location and so are all the restaurants and watering holes that one can imagine. From what I hear, you have a wonderful family and we are certainly looking forward to your next visit. The staff and I send our regards.   Sincerely,  Gita

Summary: Stayed one night as I passed through newport area.  Room was spacious and overall clean. AC cooled the room for a comfortable nights sleep.  Road traffic outside is noticeable.  Great mexican food restaurant across street.
Manager Response: Dear OhioBucks,  Thanks for your feedback. I appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located right smack in the center of Newport Beach night life, where "everywhere" is within walking distance from us. You are right about El Ranchito, the Mexican restaurant just across the street. There is, as well, a ton of other places to eat and drink nearby. The beach is also just a couple of blocks away. Our rooms are practically brand new, having been recently refurbished.Thanks, again, for the nice comments and we cannot wait for your next visit.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary: We had an excellent time here it was across the street from the beach and sooo many resturants to enjoy !!  If you are lucky enough to schedule the balcony over looking the city as well as the beach you will never want to leave.  I felt like this was my home and the beach was my pool. It was very memorable i loved it .  Perfect lil getaway so close by.
Manager Response: Dear Eleanor R,  Thank you so much for your generous feedback. We love hearing that you think of us as your "home" and that you had a "very memorable stay with us". Those comments are what any hotelier live for. Congratulations on your recent nuptials and we are extremely happy that we had a hand in making your honeymoon "very memorable". We are all looking forward to your next visit, on your first wedding anniversary, perhaps? Let us know and we will hold The Newport Beach Suite (balcony & jacuzzi) for you.   Sincerely,  Gita

Summary: Little Inn has very nice rooms and furnishings, and Gita in the office couldn't be nicer.  The room had an excellent shower, a totally comfortable bed, large plasma TV, free wi-fi, small frig, microwave, coffeemaker.  We were on the street level in the middle of summer and did not experience exceptional noise.  No breakfast is provided, but by walking across the street you're at McDonald's, Subway, or a full-service donut shop.  Free bikes, short run to the sand ...  We were very pleased with our visit.
Manager Response: Dear ryansgrandma,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us wonderful feed back. First of all, it was my great pleasure to be of service to you. It is quite fulfilling to hear that the amenities we have put in the rooms are appreciated by our guests and are being put to good use. I also want to thank you, much like the previous reviewer, for confirming that we are a quite hotel for the most part. Although I must emphasize that we are centrally located, thus, within walking distance to any restaurant or watering hole in the Newport Beach area, not to mention the beach itself. Thanks again, ryansgrandma and we hope you will visit us again in the near future.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary Heading: Close to everything including the sand
Summary: It was a very enjoyable stay. Outside was very appealing. Decor inside very nice. Walking distance to the beach. Room had all the comforts of home. Micro,coffee pot,Fridge,iron and board+blow dryer. Beds comfortable. Complex quiet. Easy to find,parking space for all occupants.patio . Convienece store next door. Donut shop across the street. All you need is right close including the sand. see ya next year. Phil,Moe & Kayla Ann.
Manager Response: Dear Sidnut,  It is wonderful to hear from you. We renovated our hotel about 2 years ago and it is nice to hear that you like what we have done, inside and out. I'm glad that you like our in-room amenities as well as our proximity to everything else in the area. I am especially grateful of your mention that our hotel is a quiet one, for that is exactly what we are during most times of the week, except Thursday, Friday and Saturday nights when the party scene breaks loose. Thanks for getting the word out there. Keep in touch and we look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: Loved the location of this Hotel and the convenience of being so close to the beach and shopping. It was great being able to get beach cruisers at no additional cost to pedal around on. The room had been newly renovated and was very clean. We enjoyed our visit and will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear 83Michelle1965,  It fills my heart with joy to see another happy customer take the time out of her busy schedule to let us know how well we are doing. It validates the effort that we put forth in making sure all of our guests get the value of what they pay for when they stay with us. I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart for the nice feedback. I hope that you will keep in touch and return to visit us again in the near future.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary: If you want to be near the beach in Newport this is the place for you! They provide cruisers to pedal around the peninsula which are perfect for sightseeing and no hassle of parking.  Our room was just big enough.  It was clean and new renovated.  The staff were very friendly and helpful too.  We will definitely stay here the next time we're in Newport!
Manager Response: Dear MKK513,  Thank so much you for your very kind comments. I knew at the outset that the beach cruisers would be a boon for us! Did you also use our complimentary boogie boards, beach chairs and umbrellas? I am glad that you liked the aesthetics of our newly renovated rooms. I am twice happy that our staff treated you well, not that I expected anything less in that regard. We cannot wait for you to return to visit us again.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary Heading: Good location and decent room for the price
Summary: Bear in mind that this is not the Ritz so expectations need to be in line. For a decent rate, I was happy with the room. We stayed in room 16 which has a king size bed. Room is very small but clean and in between the buildings so that may have helped with the noise problem. It backs up to a busy road but you have to keep in mind that the beach is a busy, crowded area and if you aren't willing to pay sky high prices for luxury than this place should suite your needs. Location was great, close to pier, etc. McDonalds across the street which was good for our kids. We were there for one night, on a Sunday so that probably also helped with the noise. I am a freak about bed bugs and we check every room we stay in...lift mattress, etc looking for signs of a problem and we found NO
Manager Response: Dear Miss Bunny_13,  Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback. True, we are not the Ritz-Carlton but we do try to provide decent rooms for the price that we charge. We are centrally located, you'd never have to walk far to get decent food or drinks or enjoy the beach. On a more personal note, I cannot begin to express my gratitude to you for having validated the fact that our establishment is completely free of bugs as had been previously alleged. We have been looked over, top to bottom, by the Orange County Public Health Services and passed that with flying colors. Again, thanks a million for that. As for the towel hooks in the bathrooms, that is definitely in the drawing board. It will happen as we continue to look for ways to make our guests' stay more comfortable. The next time you are in town, give us a buzz.   Sincerely, Gita

Summary: I'm japanese,so i'm sorry poor English. I stayed hermosa beach room. I felt good front man. He is very kindness. I'll stay this october. So,I'll book your hotel soon. Thanks a lot！ see you soon.
Manager Response: Dear CCCHIE,  Thank you for taking the time to give us wonderful feed back. I am happy to hear that our staff treated you very well. We here at The Little Inn by the Bay do our best to make our guests feel welcome and have a wonderful stay. We are looking forward to your next visit. Once again, thanks for the kind comments.  Sincerely, Gita

Summary: Little inn by the bay reminds me of if you have crazy friends that you only visit because they live by the ocean and you're staying in their crazy guest room. The customer service was not great. The room itself was musty with a broken shower. If you are a light sleeper, avoid this place. The noise didn't bother me, but I can sleep through anything. Lots of channels  on the TV, so if tv is your thing, then it's great. The location is pretty awesome. Walking distance to the beach, restaurants, and great bars. That was the best part of the stay.
Manager Response: Dear 598Storm598,  Thank you for taking the time to give your feed back. I apologize for the condition of the shower in your room during your stay. It must have been one of those days. Please know that all of our rooms are newly renovated and that we do have a maintenance person available 24/7 in case of emergencies. Rest assured that the condition of the shower in the room you were in has been rectified.  Additionally, our hotel is centrally located and by that I mean we are within walking distance to many watering holes and restaurants in the area. That is the main contributing factor to the noise you were speaking of, especially during Friday and Saturday nights.  I hope that you understand that that is something beyond our control. We are all looking forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great location and quaint, remodeled rooms
Summary: This Inn is in a great location, and was recently remodeled. The rooms are quaint and stocked with a small refrigerator, coffee maker, and nicely decorated. Excellent for the price. Would stay again. Pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Dear Nitz19,  Thank you for your great feed back. We at The Little Inn by the Bay strive to provide our guests service and accommodations to make very memorable stays. Please tell your family and friends about us. We are not Newport Beach's little secret anymore! We are looking forward to your next visit.   Gita

Summary: our room was clean and the furniture was new. Short walk to the beach, pier and lots of restaurants, etc. Draw back was noisy partiers walking hone after bars closed & hot water ran out quickly in the morning. Definitely reccomend if you're looking for inexpensive alternative.
Manager Response: Dear Heather_L901,  Thank you for your nice feed back to our little hotel.   True, we are centrally located and within walking distance to many bars and restaurants in the Balboa Peninsula. That is one of the main attractions to our hotel. It is also the main reason behind the noise you were speaking of. Sad to say, there is not a lot that we can do about that one.   I also want to apologize for the lack of hot water in your room. I have looked into it and it has been rectified.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,   Gita

Summary: Bed bugs in room 3!!! Travelled home with us. Hotel staff would not let us talk to the manager about it. It is now a big financial cost to each of us that brought it home. Also, blood stains on the sheets.
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear about your less than satisfactory experience during your stay with us. I just want to clarify a misconception: our hotel does not have any bed bugs. We are duly certified by the Public Health Services of Orange Co. as having satisfactorily met the requirements set by the state/county in that regard.   I also apologize for the fact that the manager was not available to address your concern that day. Our staff is empowered to resolve any guest related issues to ameliorate any of our guests' concerns. Perhaps we need to remind our staff of said policy. At any rate, should you give us another chance to be of service to you, we promise to, at least, meet your expectations if not surpass it. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed 2 nights with a rather large group of senior Motorcycle travelers.The rooms are VERY small and the bathroom facilities were sadly lacking.The towels were thin, and "dingy", and the shower mat was an "indoor/outdoor" carpet remnant, certainly not very absorbent on a cold tile floor! There was not a single towel hook anywhere in the bathroom, or on the bathroom door.My husband and I had no heat in our room...in January!  I asked the gentleman at the desk to please look into the isssue and he offered us a portable heater...we declined for obvious safety issues! Since we were going out for the day, he told me that his maintenance person would fix the heater which appeared to be a simple A/C unit with no heat option...this did not happen! The hotel is between 2 very busy,
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that your experience with us was not what you nor we would have wanted it to be. We are a quaint, little hotel in Newport Beach. That is the quality that sets us apart from the other hotels in the area. What we lack in things like room size and towel hooks we make up for by way of a) our lower rates compared to the other hotels in the area and 2) by our location which is quite central to most watering holes and restaurants in the area 3) as well as the beach which most of our guests just love. Additionally, 4) all of our rooms, even if some are not as spacious, are newly refurbished.  I also apologize that our staff was re-miss in addressing your room heat issues. We have a maintenance engineer on staff and he is on call 24-hours/day for emergencies, which your situation certainly was. Rest assured that this issue has been discussed with the staff involved.   Should you allow us to be of service to you again in the future, I promise that it will be a different  but a lot more memorable experience for you and your family and friends. Let me or Gita know the next time you are in town so we can personally attend to your accommodations.   Sincerely,   Mike

Summary: A small motel between two busy streets.  About 1 block off the beach.  1960s decor.  I found it clean, with pleasant help, and inexpensive.  Try to get a room on the other side from the liquor store. Plenty of pillows, just enough towels.  They only have enough parking for one car for each room.  Don't bring two cars.  (who brings two cars?)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feed back.   I recognize our limitations when it comes to the parking situation. We are a small hotel in a very urban setting and during sold out nights it can be tough for some of our guests to find parking. That is why we implement the one car per room policy. However, we relax implementing that policy at times if the situation calls for it.   Again, thank you for your feed back and let me know the next time you are in town so I can personally supervise your accommodation.   Gita

Summary: I lived in Newport Beach for two years and when I come back to visit, I like to stay on the peninsula.  Little Inn is right in the middle of the action.  Very easy to get back and forth between restaurants, bars, and beach.  The room isn't huge but we're not looking for the Walforf.  The complimentary beach cruisers are a nice perk.  My only complaint this time is that the shower was pretty weak.  The water stream was very low.  The rooms can be a bit noisy with the traffic on both sides but it's really not that bad.  We'll be back when we come to town next.
Manager Response: Dear IndySteve78,  Thank you for your kind words. We are the little hotel that constantly strives to give our guests an experience they cannot soon forget. Yes, we have beach cruisers available for our guests to experience Newport Beach or Southern Cal at their own peace and close. We also have beach chairs and umbrellas available. I'm sorry to hear about the condition of the shower in your room. I will have that looked at and resolved. Until your next visit...  Gita

Summary: We booked our hotel stay and upon arriving to the hotel our accomodations could not be found. After a search, they decided to tell us it would be more expensive than our original accomodation. It was $188. and turned into $233. The towels were cheap and the walls are paper thin. They told us we would receive a king sized bed and our bed was a queen. The entire night there was yelling and loud people outside the hotel. This location is horrible next to a liquor store. There was no extra lock other than the one to the door. We will not be returning.
Manager Response: Dear paul m,  I am very sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as memorable as you or we would have wanted it to be. I will look into the reason as to why your reservation could not be located upon your arrival at our hotel. As far as the noise problem, we are centrally located and within walking distance to many bars and restaurants in the Newport Beach area. I will admit that on Friday and Saturday nights, the folks can get excessively loud. I am afraid there is not much that I can do about that. Let me know the next time you are in town and I will see to it to find you the quietest spot in our hotel.   Sincerely,  Gita
